description: Episode number 5 of Series "Phoenix". Episodes 9 and 10 of the television series Phoenix `Shaking the Tree'. The team raids a known gay drug dealer in the hope of flushing out information about Dennis, the number 1 suspect, as they believe the dealer is scared of someone who has been harassing him and it might just be Dennis. `Blessed are the Peace Makers'. Blazo is a member of the Special Operations Group who is brought into help the majors with their investigation. Blazo and Goose get on extremely well due to their interest with bombs, so Goose ends up going on an SOG exercise with Blazo and finds that he really is not as fit as he used to be.
